_sText:
Surf_Prime_Time_R3vamp by -ZaLoS- Find the original at: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/60559 A short list of most of the changes, however not all of them:
  • Raised Spawn - making it a surf down not up
  • Reverse the shotguns and nades at spawn - A limited number of shotties ( 8 ) in order to limit initial combat
  • Reduce bottlenecking to stage 2 with more teleports in and a bigger path at the start of stage 2
  • Better, more fun ramps in stage 3, better boxing
  • Separation of stage 3 and jail for better fps in jail.
  • A hidden teleport in stage one that skips you to stage 3
  • Weapon removal on new round along with automatically adding armor to increase survivability
  • An auto-free jail on a timed interval (30 secs/40 secs dm version)
  • Added ladder to top of jail so people can get back out to the very top.
  • Removal of the boarder on stage one big ramp to stop people sticking to the ramp
  • Stronger Pushes on stage one
  • Stage 2 spinning teleport to start moved to after you get a deg/scout, also not spinning
  • End of stage 2 will have a more obvious weapon pick-up area with more to choose from
  • More secrets
  • More Rewarding Jail room secret
  • Bombs added to the end of stage two (not included in dm version)
  • and more, too much to list here
Original Summary of map: Stage 1: An arena style surf. Circle endlessly if you like, killing as you go. Stage 2: A linear surf. This is intended to allow you to get some on the ramp kills or some sniper shots. Use the spining circle to circle back and try to get some more ramp kills. Stage 3: This stage is a short surf with the jail and bombsite as the main focus. !: Pro This download also includes the dm version of the map. This map was not compiled in hdr. Special thanks to intox. cLutch for hosting the beta and to the beta testers! Additional thanks to www.solidsurf.info for feed back on the map and help tips as well www.intoxgaming.com short video preview of major map changes:
